Title: KS Mechanical Pocket Watch Roman Number Half Hunter Antiqued Black Case KSP044
Description: KS Mechanical Pocket Watch Roman Number Half Hunter Antiqued Black Case KSP044 Product Features Present by Kronen&Söhne group, half hunter series. Precision 17 jewelry mechanical movement inside. Unique skeleton dial with retro texture.High quality alloy case and strap. Product Description As the prophase of Kronen & Söhne pocket watch issue, an elegant limited edition key style pendant will be sent with our pocket watch, as an honorarium for supporting Kronen & Söhne group so many years. Main Features: - Present by Kronen & Söhne group, half hunter series. -Precision 17 jewelry mechanical movement inside. - Unique skeleton dial with retro texture. - High quality alloy case and strap. - 12 months International Guarantee. Specification (approximate) - Case diameter: 47mm. - Case thickness: 13mm. - Case Material: alloy. - Chain Length: 340mm (hook included). - Chain Material: alloy. Package Included: -1 x Genuine "Kronen & Söhne" pocket watch -1 x Limited edition key style pendant. -1 x Gift Box -1 x International Warranty Card Please note this is a MECHANICAL WATCH which will stop working if you are not moving for a long time. Please wind up the watch before EVERY USAGE, and keep the watch away from magnets to ensure the watch keeps working. For detail instructions of the watch, you can access our Kronen & Söhne official website to download. If any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us.
